snippet: Prime Minister Victor Ponta’s coalition won in parliamentary elections held Sunday, an outcome that threatened to worsen a rivalry between the prime minister and the president.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Victor Ponta’s coalition won in parliamentary elections held Sunday, an outcome that threatened to worsen a rivalry between the prime minister and the president.

headline.seo: Romania Faces Upheaval as Center-Left Wins Vote
headline.main: Romania Faces Upheaval as Center-Left Wins Vote
headline.print_headline: Romania Faces Upheaval as Center-Left Wins Vote
